name: Rectomancer
description:
My submission to the Ludum Dare 35 Game Jam, which had the theme: "Shapeshift".

Keyboard+Mouse or Gamepad.

Keyboard+Mouse:

  • W = Jump
  • A/D = Left/Right
  • Mouse = aim
  • Mouse Left Button = shoot
Gamepad controls (tested with XBox360 controller):
  • Left Analog Stick = Move Left/Right
  • Left Trigger/Shoulder = Jump
  • Right Analog Stick = aim
  • Right Trigger/Shoulder = shoot

Cheats:
  • "Enter"/"Return" to skip to the next level
  • "Backspace" to return to the previous level
